pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Two ebuild versions are offered:
6.12.0.182 - corresponding to Mono latest stable 6.12.0.122 - corresponding to the distro version
Required environment variables:
OSXCROSS_ROOT - Path to OSXCross
Configurable environment variables
OSXCROSS_SDK - The target version number for macOS OS. It is part of the target triple used as the prefix to a toolchain command. (Default: 18)
*The OSXCross install must contain the target subfolder. Fork a local copy of the the osxcross ebuild to fix mistakes.
